name: Leather Sheath L
lead: This leather sheath is a perfect protective covering for your most valuable folding knives.
description: The leather sheath makes sure that your folding knife travels with you safely and comfortably. The sheath has a belt loop for easy carrying. Genuine leather is extremely durable and easy to take care of.
Brass snap and a silver-colored logo stamped into the sheath add the finishing touch to this fine sheath.
The leather sheath is suitable for Marttiini MFK and MBL folding knives.
